mapper.select:
select t1.topic_id as topicId ,DATE_FORMAT(t1.created_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "createdTime" ,t1.topic_content as "topicContent" ,t1.creator_account as "creatorAccount" from tb_gam_topic t1 where t1.record_status = 1
and t1.created_time >= startTime
and t1.created_time <= endTime
and t1.creator_account in
#{item}
order by t1.created_time desc

select t1.topic_id as "topicId" ,DATE_FORMAT(t1.created_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "createdTime" ,t1.topic_content as "topicContent" ,t1.creator_account as "creatorAccount" ,t2.img_url as "imgUrl" from tb_gam_topic t1 left join tb_file_img t2 on t1.topic_id = t2.topic_id where t1.topic_id = #{dynamicId}

select t1.topic_id as "topicId" ,DATE_FORMAT(t1.created_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "createdTime" ,t1.topic_content as "topicContent" ,t1.creator_account as "creatorAccount" ,t1.identity as "identity" ,IFNULL((SELECT SUM(1) FROM tb_comment com WHERE com.root_id = t1.topic_id and (com.p_id is null or com.p_id ="")),0) AS "commentsNum" ,IFNULL((SELECT SUM(1) FROM tb_park_like li WHERE li.like_parent_id = t1.topic_id and li.like_status = "1" and li.record_status = 1) ),0) AS "likeNum" ,group_concat(t2.img_url) as "imgUrl" from tb_gam_topic t1 left join tb_file_img t2 on t1.topic_id = t2.topic_id where t1.topic_id = #{dynamicId}

select t1.creator_account as "creatorAccount" ,date_format(t1.created_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") as "createdTime" ,t1.id as "commentId" ,t1.com_content as "comContent" ,IFNULL((SELECT SUM(1) FROM tb_comment com WHERE com.p_id is not null and t1.id = com.p_id),0) AS "replyNum" ,IFNULL((SELECT SUM(1) FROM tb_park_like li WHERE li.like_parent_id = t1.id and li.like_status = "1" and li.record_status = 1)),0) AS "likeNum" from tb_comment t1 where t1.root_id = #{dynamicId} and (t1.p_id is null or t1.p_id="")

select t1.creator_account as "creatorAccount" ,date_format(t1.created_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") as "createdTime" ,t1.id as "commentId" ,t1.com_content as "comContent" ,IFNULL((SELECT SUM(1) FROM tb_park_like li WHERE li.like_parent_id = t1.id and li.like_status = "1" and li.record_status = 1) ),0) AS "likeNum" from tb_comment t1 where t1.id = #{commentId}

select t1.creator_account as "creatorAccount" ,date_format(t1.created_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") as "createdTime" ,t1.id as "commentId" ,t1.com_content as "comContent" ,IFNULL((SELECT SUM(1) FROM tb_park_like li WHERE li.like_parent_id = t1.id and li.like_status = "1" and li.record_status = 1) ),0) AS "likeNum" from tb_comment t1 where t1.p_id = #{commentId}
select t1.creator_account as "account" from tb_park_like t1 where t1.record_status = 1 and t1.like_status = "1" and t1.like_parent_id = #{parentId}

select t1.topic_id as "topicId" ,DATE_FORMAT(t1.created_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "createdTime" ,t1.topic_content as "topicContent" ,t1.creator_account as "creatorAccount" ,t1.identity as "identity" ,IFNULL((SELECT SUM(1) FROM tb_comment com WHERE com.root_id = t1.topic_id ),0) AS "commentsNum" ,IFNULL((SELECT SUM(1) FROM tb_park_like li WHERE li.like_parent_id = t1.topic_id and li.like_status = "1" and li.record_status = 1)),0) AS "likeNum" ,ifnull((SELECT SUM(1) FROM tb_person_care tc WHERE tc.care_account= #{account} and tc.receive_account = t1.creator_account ),0) AS "careStatus" ,group_concat(t2.img_url) as "imgUrl" from tb_gam_topic t1 left join tb_file_img t2 on t1.topic_id = t2.topic_id where t1.topic_status = "1" and t1.record_status = 1 and t1.creator_account in ( select tpc.receive_account from tb_person_care tpc where tpc.care_account = #{account} ) group by t1.topic_id order by t1.created_time desc

select t1.creator_account as "creatorAccount" ,t1.id as "commentId" ,t1.com_content as "comContent" ,date_format(t1.created_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as "createdTime" ,IFNULL((SELECT SUM(1) FROM tb_comment com WHERE com.p_id is not null and t1.id = com.p_id),0) AS "replyNum" ,IFNULL((SELECT SUM(1) FROM tb_park_like li WHERE li.like_parent_id = t1.id and li.like_status = "1" and li.record_status = 1)),0) AS "likeNum" from tb_comment t1 where t1.root_id = #{dynamicId} and (p_id is null or p_id = "")
